title: Riot panels coming to PAX Australia

replies.body:
Thank you Riot and PAX! For the great venue it will be interesting on finding out the inner workings of Riot and many opportunities available as well as giving back to the community. 
{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

I wonder if the balance department will show up, or will they be sleeping thinking there job is already done. Riot pick up your game there are at least 10 champs that are very op and at least 10 that are weak as crap.
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

All Riot need to do is to hire some people who play the game and know who is strong and needs nerfs, and also who is weak and needs buffed, mabey we should have a reward system for telling riot who to buff and who to nerf
Go for a walk kid. That or actually get good at the game and stop whingeing haha.
You don't need to be high elo to be entitled to an opinion... You don't even really need to know anything to have an opinion. Take Trump for example. LUL

Trump is a cool guy, I love watching his Hearthstone streams and I learn a lot from him, he clearly knows lots about what he talks about.

Oh wait....
So you're why i couldn't have just pry
that comment is mint
Your right no one at riot actually plays the game LUL why would they do that xD
THEY SORT OF DO...
only oceanic bronze 4 cause noob teams and op champs gg thx riot {{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
stop inting

> Bronze 3

Higher than I expected from that comment
Where is our PAX skins, where is my PAX Sivir skin. {{champion:15}} Hope it will come again for our Oceanian LOL fans. :) :) :)
fcuk u riot i hate u so much im silver but in my games too many unranked like idiot why dont let them play with bronze5?
1k games silver 4 oce, I think you might be the idiot :3

Will I be able to bring my cosplay outfits to Pax?
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}
You will have to ask PAX directly. But there are usually tonnes of cosplayers there so I assume its okay =D
Will there be any league tournaments in PAX AUS? Really want to know as my friend and i would love to compete in them

I know who they are

YASUO
Are  there any pax skins to DL?
{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}} Too much info.
{{champion:105}}
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}} {{item:3632}}
Now how do we get these tickets where do we order/book them?
Buying them from http://aus.paxsite.com and getting into the panels

For PAX or the panel themselves?
If it's PAX tickets you're after, simply head over to the PAX Australia website and register! 
If it's for the panels, I'm fairly sure you just go there on the specific day. I'm not too sure.
can i get pax skin through this event?
ha
